definition: to recall with emotion/to feel sentiments
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)

sentences.english: Be sad , and you lose them all .
sentences.chinese: 若悲傷感懷，你會與他們失之交臂。

sentences.english: To me, the movie not only presents an unforgettable scene.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，這部電影不僅給我帶來了感懷的情景。

sentences.english: I've seen a sunset that would make you cry.
sentences.chinese: 我曾看過令人感懷流淚的夕落之陽。

sentences.english: Would not only such a straightforward victory reflections.
sentences.chinese: 將不僅僅是勝負這麼簡單直接的感懷。

definition: poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
to recall the past/to cherish the memory of past events/to reminisce/nostalgic
to rustle in the air/to rustle/to sough/bleak/desolate/chilly
Double Ninth or Yang Festival/9th day of 9th lunar month
to inscribe a poem (often, composed on the spot) on a painting, fan or ceramic bowl etc as a work of calligraphy/an inscribed poem
friend from whom you can seek advice
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
